Class Computer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Computer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player

    public class Computer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Player
    this class is used in the solo player mode when it is computer turn , it choose to put the disc it the place with the most changes in other word in the place that will get the most points in the current turn

      all types are explained before the computers type is always two, means the computer is the second player counter is used in the purpose of getting the points that will be caught if the disc is put in the coordinate * all possible values of counter will be saved in the possible puts array Best X and Y are the coordinate that the computer will choose mostCounter value is the most value of counter
